thread.title_full: Monday’s Digest: Alaska and American Expand Partnership and Other Airline and Airport News - The New York Times

author: Ashley Winchester
title: Monday’s Digest: Alaska and American Expand Partnership and Other Airline and Airport News
text:
Our weekday morning digest that includes information about airlines and airports, with deals, tips and anything else that travelers may want to know.
ALASKA, AMERICAN EXPAND PARTNERSHIP
In Transit Travel news, deals and tips, written by the editors and reporters of the Travel section.
